name: COVID19LOINCValueSetForSARSRelatedCoronavirusQualitativeResultsAllSources
title: COVID19 LOINC Value Set for SARS related Coronavirus Qualitative Results, All Sources
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to qualitative detection of nucleic acids from SARS-related coronavirus in various specimens by PCR.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SARS-related (includes SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2), and MERS coronavirus in various specimens by PCR.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes SARS-CoV-2 specific testing.)
